articles.title: The ultra-rare Honus Wagner card with local ties just sold for a world-record-breaking amount
articles.description:
In the same family for 117 years, collectors hadn’t known the 1909 Honus Wagner existed.

The post The ultra-rare Honus Wagner card with local ties just sold for a world-record-breaking amount appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A 1909 Honus Wagner card sold for a world-record amount, impacting local collectors.
The card was in the same Boston family for 117 years, previously unknown to collectors.
This sale highlights Boston's rich sports memorabilia history and boosts local collector interest.

articles.title: ICE deportees reportedly held on N.H. tarmac for more than 12 hours during storm
articles.description:
A flight carrying around 100 ICE detainees was grounded at Portsmouth International Airport for more than 30 hours in total during the recent winter storm.

The post ICE deportees reportedly held on N.H. tarmac for more than 12 hours during storm appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: ICE detainees were grounded at Portsmouth International Airport for over 30 hours during a winter storm.
Approximately 100 detainees were held on the tarmac for more than 12 hours.
Boston residents may face increased scrutiny over ICE operations and treatment of detainees.

articles.title: Reggie Miller: Celtics are ‘scariest’ team in the East with or without Jayson Tatum
articles.description:
The Celtics, winners of nine of their last 10, are turning heads in the Eastern Conference.

The post Reggie Miller: Celtics are ‘scariest’ team in the East with or without Jayson Tatum appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics won nine of their last ten games, showcasing strong performance.
Reggie Miller calls Celtics the 'scariest' team in the Eastern Conference.
Boston residents can expect heightened excitement as playoffs approach.

articles.title: $7 million Chatham house has a private sandy beach: ‘Super desirable and rare’
articles.description:
For the last 50 years, the same family has owned the historic home.

The post $7 million Chatham house has a private sandy beach: ‘Super desirable and rare’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Chatham house listed for $7 million features a private sandy beach.
The historic home has been owned by the same family for 50 years.
This property highlights the rarity of waterfront homes in the Boston area.

articles.title: Lawrence Summers will resign from Harvard after Epstein revelations
articles.description:
Summers, who has been on leave since November, will not return to teaching before he leaves the university.

The post Lawrence Summers will resign from Harvard after Epstein revelations appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Lawrence Summers will resign from Harvard amid Epstein-related controversies.
Summers has been on leave since November and will not return to teaching.
His resignation may affect Harvard's reputation and local academic community.
